dao.name: GET_GW_CUST_RF.DEFAULT_GUEST_TYP_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) as guest_count from gw_cust_rf where athena_id = ? and default_guest_typ = ? and rownum = 1

dao.name: GET_GW_CUST_RF.DEFAULT_SOURCE_TYP_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) as source_count from gw_cust_rf where athena_id = ? and default_source_typ = ? and rownum = 1
